short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate Sales Tax on any price by state

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool that allows online shoppers to enter in a price so they can calculate the estimated total cost (cost + sales tax) of the item(s) conveniently without having to go all the way to check out.
